attributes.action: Implement volunteering in schools & universities as part of the curriculum
attributes.additional_details: We have urgent environmental and social issues. As a result of COVID 19 we have seen a huge increase in littering, we have a catastrophic increase in unemployment and increase in mental health issues. We need to relook at the foundations of this country and work at building a better system to empower and educate people. Everyone needs to chip in collectively.
attributes.background:
Get children and young adults out of school classrooms and into communities. Give them access to more than just school subjects. 
We need to empower the next generation to create change through action.

rejection.details: Deciding whether to volunteer is a decision for individuals, not the Government or House of Commons.
